com.aurel.track.fieldType.runtime.base

Class FieldsManagerRT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.fieldType.runtime.base.FieldsManagerRT

  • public class FieldsManagerRT
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class for defining the business logic for fields at runtime

      • viewOrEdit

        public static WorkItemContext viewOrEdit(java.lang.Integer person,
                         java.lang.Integer workItemID,
                         boolean isView,
                         java.util.Locale locale,
                         boolean dropDownsNeeded)
        Loading of an existing workItem for edit or view (same screen) Normally by view the dropDown containers should not be loaded but the show values are taken from the dropDown based getShowValue() methods in both cases. So now the dropDowns are loaded anyway, the only difference (configured through isView)is in presetting the composite parent lists in edit mode with values (if no default values are set)
        Parameters:
        person -
        workItemID -
        isView -
        locale -

        Parameters:
        workItemContext -
        errorList -
        withNotify - for single issue the drop down lists and some other data is needed, but for mass operation this data is not needed

      • copy

        public static java.lang.Integer copy(WorkItemContext workItemContext,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> selectedChildren,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> originalToCopyWorkItemIDs,
                     java.util.List<ErrorData> errorList,
                     boolean validate,
                     boolean withNotify)
        Copying a workItemBean
        Parameters:
        workItemContext -
        selectedChildren -
        originalToCopyWorkItemIDs -
        errorList -
        validate - always called with true, except by copying the children (the recursive call) (the unmodified children are not validated, but simply copied)
        withNotify -
        Returns:

      • validate

        public static java.util.List<ErrorData> validate(TWorkItemBean workItemBean,
                                 WorkItemContext workItemContext,
                                 boolean confirm,
                                 boolean isCopy,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> selectedChildrenList,
                                 boolean parentIsSelected,
                                 boolean applyLinkTypeValidation)
        Validate the workItem fields (system and custom) (also the system fields could be validated if they extend IValidate)
        Parameters:
        workItemBean -
        workItemContext -
        isCopy -
        applyLinkTypeValidation - validation conditioned by link types will be applied only by saving a single issue, because during import it may give a validation error in a certain moment but thereafter by modifying also the linked item the resulting state would be valid
        Returns:

      • performSave

        public static boolean performSave(WorkItemContext workItemContext,
                  java.util.List<ErrorData> errorsList,
                  boolean isCopy,
                  boolean withNotify)
        Saves a modified or a new (copied or newly created) item
        Parameters:
        workItemContext -
        errorsList -
        isCopy - is it copy of the existing item
        withNotify - to send notification messages to the listener
        Returns:
